ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: If it is true that also with enchanters help we cannot hit 6 + i agree to petition on this. I hate to read in a necro list that they kill SAND GIANTS wich is
ygData.messageBody:
If it is true that also with enchanters help we cannot hit 6 + i agree to
petition on this. I hate to read in a necro list that they kill SAND GIANTS
wich is 35+ monster with a group of 5 and 6 necros 18 and 19 lv !!
Magicians say that they do same with griffon in EC and are planing on it.
Why we cant do it? becouse all ours spells are resisted hmmm ! I think that
verant must put similar hard block on other magic users. Necro is never
resisted on his life tap spell!

At 14.04 26/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>>
>>
>> This works very well. I hunt occasionally with an enchanter friend. She
>> would cast the inital debuff to lower magic resistance, the critter
>> charges, the pet blocks, I root and we both blast. If we get into trouble,
>> the pet blocks, I root and we both Gate. Great system.
>>
>> -Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
>
>From what I understand, there is a hard cap on when our spells become
>completely
>ineffective, and it was put in to prevent exploits. I believe the level of
>this
>cap is 6 levels above the caster. I think its great to stick together on a
>petition, and I feel that this is one issue that needs to be addressed.
>Here are
>my two prposed solutions.
>
>1) Raise the cap to 9+ levels of the caster
>2) make the cap 6+ levels of the highest player in the group.
>
>Cheers
>Malkin
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>With more than 17 million e-mails exchanged daily...
>http://www.onelist.com
>...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
